lexUnit.name: fear.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: be afraid of; feel anxiety on behalf of

sentence.text: She rushed to tell me , fearing that I might be upset .
They fear that if nothing is done , the fish will disappear altogether .
` I fear we have to make a quick decision , " said Oliver ironically , looking out of the window and seeing a departing victoria .
But I fear you are dying
First and foremost , we have to understand that we rarely fear what we have found to be true .
She most feared what people thought of her , and imagined that they talked constantly about her behind her back .
They wriggled their basslines where others feared to have fun .
He always feared to inherit the Khanate . "
Jaq feared being marked as a heretic ; but that was not the reason why he was being specially scrutinized .
The old person may fear being cut off , and the family may feel they are abdicating responsibility , experiencing some guilt .
They fear damaging the child within their secure family relationship .
Today , millions of people fear losing their job , their home or their business .
It was n't that he feared betrayal .
I knew I was being irrational but I began to fear the worst .
Peter and Ann despaired of Jacqueline , but feared her destructive urges .
` She feared Melwas , and she fears you .
Thus a widowed mother of an adult son is loved and trusted , but also sometimes feared by him .
He knew that this tunnel-like place was shunned by tramps and feared even by drunks and peg-sellers .
In the grip of winter 's ice , the same hill was feared by riders , drivers and those on foot .
Although he had suffered only a broken arm , it had been feared by two doctors at the scene that he had suffered serious head injuries .
Women 's wisdom has long been feared : Old Women , Witches , Sibyls , Seers .
Many were still feared trapped in the rubble .
It is feared that the year may prove to be the worst on record
LEE SHARPE feared the worst when hospital tests showed the young United star had meningitis .
Tories fear no let-up on jobs for 18 months
They fear endless meetings and worry that they do n't know enough to join in .
` I fear the two of you will leave me far behind . "
What do you fear most for the future ?
Tony Turner is just one of those who fears for his job .
He said : ` I fear for my safety .
` You have nothing to fear from me , " he said .
` Maria Luisa has nothing to fear from Steve . "
Hart was well respected but somewhat feared by his men .
